def replace_kth_smallest(nums, K):
    nums.sort()
    nums[K - 1] = 1
    return nums

def replace_kth_smallest(nums, K):
    nums.sort()
    nums[K - 1] = -1
    return nums

def replace_kth_smallest(nums, K):
    nums.sort()
    nums[K - 1] = 1
    return nums

def replace_kth_smallest(nums, K):
    nums.sort()
    nums[K + 1] = 0
    return nums

def replace_kth_smallest(nums, K):
    nums.sort()
    nums[K * 1] = 0
    return nums

def replace_kth_smallest(nums, K):
    nums.sort()
    nums[K - 2] = 0
    return nums

def replace_kth_smallest(nums, K):
    nums.sort()
    nums[K - 0] = 0
    return nums

def replace_kth_smallest(nums, K):
    nums.sort()
    nums[K - 0] = 0
    return nums

def replace_kth_smallest(nums, K):
    nums.sort()
    nums[K - -1] = 0
    return nums
